definitions.definition: ( cooking , countable , uncountable ) A beaten mixture of flour and liquid (usually egg and milk), used for baking (e.g. pancakes , cake , or Yorkshire pudding ) or to coat food (e.g. fish) prior to frying .
examples: To the dismay of his mother, the boy put his finger into the pancake batter .

definitions.definition: ( countable , slang ) A binge ; a heavy drinking session .
examples: When he went on a batter , he became very violent.

definitions.definition: A paste of clay or loam .
( countable , printing ) A bruise on the face of a plate or of type in the form .

main_definition: ( cooking , countable , uncountable ) A beaten mixture of flour and liquid (usually egg and milk), used for baking (e.g. pancakes , cake , or Yorkshire pudding ) or to coat food (e.g. fish) prior to frying .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , slang ) A binge ; a heavy drinking session .
A paste of clay or loam .
( countable , printing ) A bruise on the face of a plate or of type in the form .

definitions.definition: ( architecture ) An incline on the outer face of a built wall.

main_definition: ( architecture ) An incline on the outer face of a built wall.

definitions.definition: The player attempting to hit the ball with a bat.
examples: The first batter hit the ball into the corner for a double.

definitions.definition: A player of the batting side now on the field .
The player now receiving strike ; the striker .
Any player selected for his or her team principally to bat , as opposed to a bowler .

main_definition: ( baseball ) The player attempting to hit the ball with a bat.
secondary_definitions: ( cricket ) A player of the batting side now on the field .
( cricket ) The player now receiving strike ; the striker .
( cricket ) Any player selected for his or her team principally to bat , as opposed to a bowler .
